item.title: Get Started
item.description: This tutorial will walk you through the first steps of using Fore and introduce some of the elements. For further study it is highly recommended to use the huge list of demos that come with Fore. These showcase all features and how to use them in concrete working examples. Using Fore To use Fore you have to add one CSS stylesheet and the Fore module to your page. Loading from CDN Add these tags to the head of your HTML file.
